title: Buildings get stuck below border in 2D View

content.raw:
It's possible to get stuck in a state where, in the 2D View, part of the building is hidden below the border of the 2D and 3D areas. I can't seem to scroll down to view the hidden part, or drag the canvas. If I zoom waaaaay in, more scroll bar appears, but then I'm zoomed too far.
It seems to happen when I draw a building, and then grab the walls and drag them below that border. They get stuck down there.
